description:
NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT

File Number: W8486-238800/A 
Tier: 1  (< $2M)
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a provider to deliver Source Testing and Air Dispersion Modelling of the Ammunition Demilitarization Thermal Treatment Systems located at CFB Dundurn, Saskatchewan.
The intent of this solicitation is to establish a contract to complete the Source Testing and Air Dispersion Modelling.
The contract duration is vetted to be 01 year.
The Deliverables 
Source Testing 
\o CFB Winnipeg Det Dundurn.
The security requirements: supplier should hold a reliability status.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Source Testing and Air Dispersion Modelling Services
#### Solicitation Number: W8486-238800/A
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Publication Date: 2023-05-09
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-05 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals for the provision of Source Testing and Air Dispersion Modelling services for the Ammunition Demilitarization Thermal Treatment Systems located at CFB Dundurn, Saskatchewan. The successful bidder will be awarded a one-year contract to complete the source testing and air dispersion modelling.

**Contract Requirements**
* Source Testing and Air Dispersion Modelling services
* Location: CFB Dundurn, Saskatchewan
* Duration: One-year contract
* Time frame of delivery: Source testing to be completed by mid-September 2023

**Security Requirements**
* Suppliers must hold a Reliability Status security clearance
* No security level required for document safeguarding
* No citizen restriction

**Bid Submission Information**
* Bid documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
* Bidders must provide the required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation

**Inquiries**
* Inquiries regarding this request for proposal must be submitted to Chris Hunsley (chris.hunsley@forces.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**
* Bidders are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the requirements outlined in the request for proposal
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

You may download the bid documents from the following locations:
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5347/02-w8486-238800-a-rfp-en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5347/02-w8486-238800-a-rfp-fr.pdf

Note: The tender has expired and is no longer active. -ed.
